export default function Validate(user){var regexmail=/^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9-]+(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)*$/;var regexpass=/^(?=.*[0-9]+.*)(?=.*[a-zA-Z]+.*)[0-9a-zA-Z]{6,}$/;//La contraseña debe contener al menos una letra, al menos un número y tener más de seis caracteres.
var errors={};if(!user.email){errors.email="Ingresar email";}else{if(regexmail.test(user.email)){errors.email="";}else{errors.email="Se requiere un email valido";}}if(user.email.length>35){errors.email="Hasta 35 caracteres";}if(!user.password){errors.password="Ingresar password";}else{if(user.password.length<6||user.password.length>10){errors.password="Entre 6 y10 caracteres";}else{if(!regexpass.test(user.password))errors.password="Debe tener almenos 1 numero";else errors.password="";}}return errors;}
